newsitem.title: UK: United Biscuits sees continued progress.
newsitem.headline: United Biscuits sees continued progress.

text.p: Britain's United Biscuit (Holdings) Plc said on Tuesday it still anticipated its businesses showing progress in the current financial year.

Chairman Colin Short told the annual general meeting that in March the company had said that while all its markets remained highly competitive, margins were firm and a year of continued progress was anticipated.
"Two months later, my view remains unchanged and the business continues to focus on delivering value to our shareholders," he said in a statement.
